documents.document:
Plastic spare part mould,mold

Detailed Product Description

1.Plastic auto lamp mould:1+1cavity
2.Lamp mould material:2738
3.Lamp mould software:UG
4.Hot runner

Plastic auto mould designed by UG, autocad, SolidWorks, CATRA, etc. software. In order to communicate with customer easily, we use can use four kinds of design software. PLA-Mould can design and manufacture all kinds of plastic injection mould.

?. Detail description of Plastic auto mould

Product Name Plastic auto mould
Size 210x603x211mm
Product description PC or PMMA raw material
Plastic auto mouldcavity 1R+1L cavity
Plastic auto mould size 1400x970x970mm
Plastic auto mould material 2738
Plastic auto mould life 200k shots
Runner system Hot runner 2 pin valve
Ejection system Ejector block
Plastic auto mould features Good quality
Injection cycle time 45 seconds
Tooling time 70 days

?. PLA-Mould service process

1.Design/sample
Product, mould, etc.
?
2.Discussion
Mould material,cavity number,price,runner,payment,etc.
?
3.Order placed
According drawing or sample.
?
4.Design mould
We will send mould design to customer for confirmation
?
5.Mould tooling
We start to make mould after mould design confirmed

?
6.Mould processing
Send pictures to customer to let customer what we doing
?
7.Mould shot trial
Send mould shot trial samples to customer to confirm mould quality
?
8.Delivery
Ship mould after mould quality confirmed.

?. Pictures of the plastic auto mould.

Electric bicycle part mould

Learn more about us please visit our website http://www.pla-mould.com, contact us via sales@pla-mould.com.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Detailed Product Description

1.Electric bicycle part mould:1cavity
2.Mould material20, 718
3.Mould base:LKM
4.Mould software:UG, AUTOCAD
5.Cold runner

Electric bicycle part mould designed by UG, autocad, SolidWorks, CATRA, etc. software. In order to communicate with customer easily, we use can use four kinds of design software. PLA-Mould can design and manufacture all kinds of plastic injection mould.

?. Detail description of electric bicycle part mould

Product Name Electric bicycle part mould
Size 440x180x200mm
Product description PP raw material
Electric bicycle part mould cavity 1cavity
Electric bicycle part mould Size 600x340x400mm
Suitable machine Around 250T
Electric bicycle part mould material P20, 718, etc.
Electric bicycle part mould life 800k shots
Runner system Cold runner
Ejection system Ejector pim
Electric bicycle part mould features Good quality
Injection cycle time 55 seconds
Tooling time 60 days

?. PLA-Mould service process

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about us please visit our website http://www.pla-mould.com, contact us via sales@pla-mould.com.

LINHAI PLA-Mould Factory

Please contact us via sales@pla-mould.com

———————————————————————–

PLA-Mould is a professional mould maker, which located in “China mold town” — Taizhou City.

Whether it is standard structure plastic moulds, or our company standard structure plastic molds, you can expect both the high quality and competitive price.

PLA-mould offers solutions to your manufacturing needs with complete computer generated design and 3-D programming for plastic mould. We serve all industries such as aerospace, consumer products, electronics, medical, automotive, etc. We have very rich knowledge on designing good plastic mold which just fit for your plastic injection molding machine and blow molding machine, and meanwhile satisfy you on the quantity of mass produce.

Our goal at PLA-mould is to provide you with the highest quality and turnaround time available. Our personalized service produces better customer satisfaction. We develop long-lasting, mutual, professional relationships. Send mould draft to customer for reference at the same time we quote mould price. Save time and make order run fast. Cooperate with us easy communication, exact understanding.

We provide one year aftersale service, we save customer mould design data for 3 years. Once you require spare parts for the plastic mould, we can supply you easily.

We want to be sure you are 100% satisfied with our results. Your satisfaction is our constant pursuit.

Customer Satisfaction -
PLA-mould reputation on delivering quality products to its customers, and delivering them on time. Never leave problem to customer!

Check our authentication and verification inspection information, please visit our alibaba website: http://pla-mould.en.alibaba.com

————————————————————–

Please contact us via sales@pla-mould.com website: http://www.pla-mould.com http://www.pla-mould.cn

Plastic injection mould (analysed by moldflow)

Please contact us at sales@pla-mould.com, http://www.pla-mould.com
---------------------------------------------
Detailed Product Description

1.Plastic injection mould:1cavity
2.Plastic injection mould material20
3.Mould base:LKM
4.Mould software:UG
5.Cold runner

Plastic injection mould designed by UG, autocad, SolidWorks, CATRA, etc. software. We use four kinds of software in order to communicate with customer easily, as different customer may use different software. PLA-Mould can design and manufacture all kinds of plastic injection mould.

?. Detail description of plastic injection mould

Product Name Plastic injection mould
Size Diameter 25mm*height 23mm
Product description PP raw material
Plastic injection mould cavity 8 cavity
Plastic injection mould size 240x230x200mm
Suitable machine Around 90Ton
Plastic injection mould material P20
Plastic injection mould life 800k shots
Runner system Cold runner
Ejection system Ejector pin
Plastic injection mould features Good quality mould
Injection cycle time 10 seconds
Tooling time 20 days

?. PLA-Mould service process
